item.title: Startup guide
item.description:
Thanks for using QRssReader

To get fresh news simply press reload button in the middle of top tool bar. To get more informations about using QRssReader press help button on the left of top tool bar. To change news sources press feed managament button on the right of top tool bar.

Enjoy using QRssReader
item.dc:creator: Petr Ka훾er

item.title: Bug reporting
item.description: Currently there is no bug report mechanism. If you found a bug, please email me at <kacerpetr@gmail.com> and I will try to fix it.
